name: The Best Vegan Pumpkin Bread
description: This is seriously the best vegan pumpkin bread you'll ever eat! It's perfectly spiced, moist and easy to make in 1 bowl. Better than Starbucks, this will become one of your favorite Fall recipes!

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and grease a loaf pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and grease a loaf pan.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine the ground flaxseed and water. Set aside to thicken; this is your flax egg.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, combine the ground flaxseed and water. Set aside to thicken; this is your flax egg.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the pumpkin, brown sugar, canola oil, flax egg and soy milk until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, whisk together the pumpkin, brown sugar, canola oil, flax egg and soy milk until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flour, then sprinkle the baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves on top of the flour. Stir with a large spoon or spatula, gently, until just combined. Do not over mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flour, then sprinkle the baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves on top of the flour. Stir with a large spoon or spatula, gently, until just combined. Do not over mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into the prepared pan and sprinkle the pepitas on top. Bake for about 1 hour and 15 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into the prepared pan and sprinkle the pepitas on top. Bake for about 1 hour and 15 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it cool in the pan for 10-15 minutes, then transfer the loaf to a cooling rack. Slice carefully right away, or let cool completely for easier slicing and serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it cool in the pan for 10-15 minutes, then transfer the loaf to a cooling rack. Slice carefully right away, or let cool completely for easier slicing and serving.

keywords: vegan pumpkin bread, vegan pumpkin recipes
